## Source: ossf-package-analysis (923e18277dc972e221ab7a161e65c18219ff037b3a347b86f86df7f6cba1bcfb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'preview-server-auth-poc' @ 1.1.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
